data.enText: the round yellow part in the middle of an egg
Separate the whites from the yolks.

tr: nutritive material of an ovum stored for the nutrition of an embryo (especially the yellow mass of a bird or reptile egg)
the yellow spherical part of an egg that is surrounded by the albumen

value.def: The yolk of an egg is the yellow part in the middle.

example.tran: 蘸了蛋黄液的黄油吐司
